name: Spigelia
Relationship: Compare: SPIGELIA MARYLANDICA (maniacal excitement, paroxysmal laughing and crying, loud, disconnected talking, vertigo, dilated pupils, congestions); ACON.; CACT.; CIMICIF.; ARNICA (Spigelia is a chronic Arnica); CANNAB. (Supraorbital pain); NAJA; SPONG. (HEART); SABAD.; TEUCR.; CINA (worm symptoms).
Modalities: Better: lying on right side with head high; inspiring

Heart: Frequent attacks of palpitation, especially with foul odor from mouth
Craving for hot water which relieves
Precordial pain and great aggravation from movement
Dyspnoea; must lie on right side with head high
Neuralgia extending to arm or both arms
Pericarditis, with sticking pains, palpitation, dyspnoea
Rheumatic carditis, trembling pulse; whole left side sore
Eyes: Severe pain in and around eyes, extending deep into socket
Feel too large; pressive pain on turning them
Mind: Afraid of sharp, pointed things, pins, needles, etc.
Head: Pain from beneath frontal eminence and temples, extending to eyes
Pain as if a band around head
Semi-lateral, involving left eye; pain violent, throbbing; worse, making a false step
Vertigo, hearing exalted
Face: Prosopalgia, involving eye, zygoma, cheek, teeth, temple, worse, stooping, touch, from morning until sunset
Nose: Chronic catarrh, with post-nasal dropping of bland mucus
Forepart of nose always dry; discharge through posterior nares
Mouth: Tearing toothache; worse, after eating and cold

details: Spigelia is an important remedy in pericarditis and other diseases of the heart, because the provings were conducted with the greatest regard for objective symptoms and the subjective symptoms are by innumerable confirmations proved to be correct (C. Hering).Has marked elective affinity for the eye, heart, and nervous system. Neuralgia of the fifth nerve is very prominent in its effects. Is especially adapted to anaemic, debilitated, rheumatic, and scrofulous subjects. Stabbing pains. Heart affections and neuralgia. VERY SENSITIVE TO TOUCH. PARTS FEEL CHILLY; SEND SHUDDER THROUGH FRAME. A remedy for stitches due to the presence of worms. CHILD REFERS TO THE NAVEL AS THE MOST PAINFUL PART. (GRANAT.; NUX MOSCH.)
dosage: Sixth to thirtieth potency for neuralgic symptoms; second to third potency for inflammatory symptoms.
